name: DAMNOSAUR
description: DAMNOSAUR is a chaotic arcade shooter that combines colourful anime with the Dino-apocalypse! Fight alone, or with a friend to take down these monstrous dinosaurs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit Processor: Intel i3-6320 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 210 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 64-bit Processor: intel i5-835G Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 210 MB available space
